memberdef.name: ns_audio_default
memberdef.initializer: = { .eAIPowerMode = NS_MAXIMUM_PERF, .api = &ns_power_V1_0_0, .bNeedAudAdc = true, .bNeedSharedSRAM = false, .bNeedCrypto = false, .bNeedBluetooth = false, .bNeedUSB = false, .bNeedIOM = false, .bNeedAlternativeUART = false, .b128kTCM = false, .bEnableTempCo = false, .bNeedITM = false}

briefdescription.para: Good for AI that uses audio peripherals.
Sets CPU frequency to one of the ns_power_modes.
Wraps am_hal_sysctrl_sleep to enable and disable systems as needed.

detaileddescription.para: neuralSPOT-aware deep_sleep - turns off certain systems off before sleeping and turns them back upon waking.
